member.summary: Interface for objects providing third party logout scripts

member.name: M:CMS.Membership.Web.UI.ICustomSignOutScriptProvider.GetSignOutScript(System.String,System.Web.UI.Page)
member.summary: Builds and returns a custom logout script which is obligated to call the given callback upon finish.
member.param: Callback method to be called when this custom script finishes

member.summary: Handles SignOut request emerged from Javascript SignOut. Returns a URL to which user should be redirected after SignOut. If null is returned, no SignOut has been performed and no redirection is required.
